amendment.description: Amendment requires the Department of the Treasury and Federal banking agencies to conduct a five year study of the extent to which credit is being provided to and for small business and farms as a result of enactment of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 2 printed in H. Rept. 106-214 to provide for a five year study by the Department of the Treasury and Federal banking agencies on the effect of the bill on small business and farm lending.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
